extendedInfo.description: Pak TV Global provides the links to the web streaming of the popular Pakistani, Indian and Rest of the world TV Channels. Includes News, Entertainment and Sports channels for Mobile Phones, Tablets and Android based devices.We continuously add new channels on regular basis please make sure you have set auto update on your device for this application.FOR Galaxy (S3, S4 etc. Devices) install Flash Player from:http://download.itsmybox.co.uk/flash4android.phpSystems Requirements- MX Player from Android Market to watch channels- Flash Player on your device to see the channels. - For Jelly Beans devices install flash player fromhttp://download.itsmybox.co.uk/flash4android.php- Vitameo PlayerWhen you get the message to install Vitamio player, choose any option and install the player and restart the app. It is important to play some live channels.*******For Samsung Galaxy Tab: make sure Javascript is enabled and Plug-ins are set to Always on.- Open the Browser- Hit the Menu Button- Confirm that Enable Javascript is checked- Choose Settings > Enable Plug-Ins and make sure that it's set to Always On---------------KNOWN ISSUES---------------If app fail to run, uninstall the old version first and then install the latest version from Android Market.Some channels take a bit longer to load, wait until it loads or you see a message.-----------------------------------------------------BEFORE POSTING YOUR COMMENTS PLEASE MAKE SURE TO INSTALL LATEST VERSION

I appreciate this app. Very useful and catchy. . \"But every time I return back from any playing channel, it goes back to main page of app i.e (on news channels first page)... instead of returning to the page of channels which were being viewed before playing last channel.\" . So plz admin correct this problem instantly.  Then I will give u full stars... Thanks
